column4: hello. I restarted Ubuntu and now the font are only squares :/. I think it's the theme I was testing. How can I undo this from terminal?
How can I reset to Ubuntu's default theme through terminal?
you may have a look at the tool "gconftool-2" the gconf settings key "/desktop/gnome/interface/gtk_theme"
it is a string, that can be set to some theme name
